root.name: Xybots
root.description: OverviewXybots was as an arcade game developed by Atari Games in 1987 and was later released on the Atari Lynx and the ZX Spectrum. The players play as Major Rock Hard and Captain Ace Gunn who must travel through a 3D maze and fight against the Xybots whose mission is to destroy all mankind. Sega Genesis and Nintendo Entertainment System versions were planned but were never released.
